item.title: Bucky Web Toolkit
item.author: Abishek Kumar
item.description: Bucky Golang based library/toolkit for building Microservices written in Go (Golang). It is as durable as the vibranium, which is also up to 40 times faster. If you are in need of full packed features and good productivity, bucky is your guy. Contents Contents Usage Benchmarks Users The gopher UsageBenchmarksBucky uses a custom version of HttpRouter See all benchmarks Benchmark name (1) (2) (3) (4) BenchmarkGin_GithubAll 43550 27364 ns/op
